intro.value: The Google Doc is located here.
To start working on your story, create a new Google Doc, get the id of that doc, replace the `id` in `config.json`.
To learn more about coding with the template, click here.

Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean.

A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth. Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control about the blind texts it is an almost unorthographic life One day however a small line of blind text by the name of Lorem Ipsum decided to leave for the far World of Grammar.

The Big Oxmox advised her not to do so, because there were thousands of bad Commas, wild Question Marks and devious Semikoli, but the Little Blind Text didn’t listen. She packed her seven versalia, put her initial into the belt and made herself on the way.

When she reached the first hills of the Italic Mountains, she had a last view back on the skyline of her hometown Bookmarksgrove, the headline of Alphabet Village and the subline of her own road, the Line Lane.

authorBio.bio: Michael Sol Warren is an environment and outdoors reporter. Follow him on Twitter @msoldub or email him at mwarren@njadvancemedia.com.
Bobby Olivier is a music and culture reporter. Follow him on Twitter @BobbyOlivier or email him at bolivier@njadvancemedia.com.
Andre Malok is a multimedia specialist. He is a drone pilot and the host of “Outdoors with Andre.” Follow him on Twitter @AndreMalok or email him at amalok@njadvancemedia.com.
Blake Nelson is a data and investigative reporter. Follow him on Twitter @BCunninghamN or email him at bnelson@njadvancemedia.com.
Yan Wu is an interactive designer and developer. Follow her on Twitter @codingyan or email her at ywu@njadvancemedia.com
Christopher Kelly is director of topics and news innovation. Follow him on Twitter @ChrisKelly74 or email him at ckelly@njadvancemedia.com.

extraCredit: Additional contributions: Brittney Davies, Ashleigh Graf, Alyssa Passeggio, Suzanne Pavkovic and Sydney Shaw
